Posts.EditableText: Hi I can see from previous posts that this is an old chestnut, but might as well flag it again: I too am getting the 'Error running script: Error evaluating expression 'canAdd': Unknown object or variable 'canAdd' error, occasionally and seemingly at random, when manipulating objects when a timer is running. I can't see that a solution was ever found, so maybe I just have to live with it popping up infrequently? Thanks.
Posts.HTML:
Hi

I can see from previous posts that this is an old chestnut, but might as well flag it again: I too am getting the 'Error running script: Error evaluating expression 'canAdd': Unknown object or variable 'canAdd' error, occasionally and seemingly at random, when manipulating objects when a timer is running. I can't see that a solution was ever found, so maybe I just have to live with it popping up infrequently?

Thanks.
